text: The 1929 Santa Barbara State Roadrunners football team represented Santa Barbara StateUniversity of California, Santa Barbara was known as Santa Barbara State College from 1921 to 1943. during the 1929 college football season. Santa Barbara State competed as an Independent in 1929 and 1930. They had been a member of the California Coast Conference (CCC) from 1927 to 1928, but that conference disbanded after the 1928 season. The 1929 Roadrunners were led by second-year head coach Harold Davis and played home games at Peabody Stadium in Santa Barbara, California. They finished the season with a record of four wins, four losses and one tie (4–4–1). Overall, the team outscored its opponents 87–64 for the season. ==Schedule== ==Notes== ==References== Category:UC Santa Barbara Gauchos football seasons Santa Barbara State f UC Santa
title: 1929 Santa Barbara State Roadrunners football team
